permissions: Authenticated user whose user ID matches the provided user relationship may create a proffer like.
side_effects: Creates a proffer like record, increments the associated proffer like_count, and refreshes the proffer like user ID list.
validation_notes: --proffer is required. --user is required and must match the current user. A user can only like a given proffer once (proffer_id unique per user_id).

flags.name: --user
flags.description: User ID (required, must match current user)
